![](https://www.deepnetsolutions.com/images/logo.png)

You need a powerful VPS hosted on quality hardware and network? You are missing our old MooseVZ offers? Then, you may want to check our new product line up below!

**Please take note, all price below are in Canadian Dollars.**

<hr>

**DNS-OVZ-128**

* 1 CPU Core
* 128 MB RAM // 64MB Swap
* 10 GB Storage
* 250 GB @ 1Gbps
* 13.00$/year
* Order link: https://clients.gestiondbi.com/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=183


**DNS-OVZ-256**

* 1 CPU Core
* 256 MB RAM // 64MB Swap
*20 GB Storage
* 500 GB @ 1Gbps
* 2.00$/month or 20.00$/year
* Order link: https://clients.gestiondbi.com/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=184


**DNS-OVZ-512**

* 1 CPU Core
* 512 MB RAM // 64MB Swap
* 35 GB Storage
* 1 TB @ 1Gbps
* 3.00$/month or 32.00$/year
* Order link: https://clients.gestiondbi.com/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=185


**DNS-OVZ-1024**

* 2 CPU Cores
* 1 GB RAM // 64MB Swap
* 50 GB Storage
* 1.5 TB @ 1Gbps
* 4.50$/month	or 46.00$/year
* Order link: https://clients.gestiondbi.com/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=186


<hr> 

<pre>
Our OpenVZ are available in the following locations:

Montreal, Quebec, Canada
New Jersey, Piscataway, USA
Miami, Florida, USA
Atlanta, Georgia, USA
Dallas, Texas, USA
Los Angeles, California, USA
Amsterdam, The Netherlands, Europe
London, United Kingdon, Europe

We also have those locations under our LowEndSpirit NAT VPS range:

Johannesburg, South Africa
Hong Kong, China
</pre>

<hr> 

N.B: DeepNet Solutions new VPS line up doesn't have SLA and is not intend to be use in production. Please refer to our Premium OpenVZ from Gestion DBI for any production or critial service.

<hr> 

* All our VPS support TUN/TAP/PPP
* We accept TOR Relay on our Dedicated IPv4 VPS. Read AuP for more information
* We accept Paypal, Stripe and Bitcoin (via Bitpay)
* Looking Glass: https://www.deepnetsolutions.com/faq.html
* We speak French and English. You can reach us 24/7, via the following link: http://gdbi.pw/contact

Regards, David.
